    • Uses of Filter in filters.blur

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.blur 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BoxBlur
      Box blur filter.
      class  GaussianBlur
      Uses a 2D-Gaussian Function to blur an image.
      class  MeanBlur  
      class  ShakeEffect
      Shake-effects the input image based on the Gaussian Blur.

    • Uses of Filter in filters.border

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.border 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GaborFilter
      A Gabor filter implementation (Sinusoidal Wave + Gaussian Function).
      class  GaussianGradient
      Computes a Gaussian-function based Gradient of the image on both or single directions.
      class  HessianFilter
      Filters the image according to properties of the Hessian Matrix (good to find and analyse borders)..
      class  HighlightDarkEdges
      Highlights the dark edges biased by a Gaussian function.
      class  HighOrderGradient
      Computers high order gradients or derivatives from the image.
      class  LaplacianFilter
      A Laplacian filter.
      class  LinearGradient
      Linear gradient that combines the derivatives in the x and y directions.
      class  RodriguesSobel
      A modification of the Sobel filter, this algorithm is presented in (http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/login.jsp?
      class  Sobel
      Classifical Sobel filter //TO BE FINISHED

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.matrices 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CoOccurrenceFilter
      A filter based on the Co-Occurrence Matrix.
      class  RunLengthFilter
      A filter based on the run length matrix.

    • Uses of Filter in filters.misc

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.misc 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EntropyFilter
      Entropy: draws a circle of radius r around each pixel; gets the histogram of that circle split in numBins chunks; then calculates the entropy as \sum_{p~\mathrm{in}~\mathrm{histogram}} -p*\mathrm{log}_2(p), where p is the probability of each chunk in the histogram..
      class  FrangiFilter
      Implementation inspired by the work of Frangi et al.: Multiscale vessel enhancement filtering and on the matlab implementation.
      class  VesselnessFilter
      Implementation inspired by the work of Frangi et al.: Multiscale vessel enhancement filtering

    • Uses of Filter in filters.morphology

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.morphology 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Closing
      Closing operation from mathematical morphology (dilation + erosion).
      class  Dilation
      A dilation operation from mathematical morphology.
      class  Erosion
      The erosion operation from mathematical morphology.
      class  Opening
      Opening operation from mathematical morphology (erosion + dilation).
      class  TopHat
      Top-hat operation from mathematical morphology (opening then subtracts the result from the original image).

    • Uses of Filter in filters.noise

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.noise 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AnisotropicDiffusion
      Anisotropic diffusion is a blurring algorithm that preserve edges.
      class  BinaryNoiseReduction
      Reduces the noise from binary or grey-scale images.
      class  KuwaharaFilter
      Implementation of the Kuwahara Filter.

    • Uses of Filter in filters.sharpen

      Subclasses of Filter in filters.sharpen 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EnhanceSharpAreas
      Enchance sharpen areas based on a "laplacian-gaussian" filter.
      class  SimpleSharpen
      A simple sharpen that uses a simple kernel to sharpen the image.
